title: Poison Staff
summaries: The Poison Staff is a Hardmode magic weapon which auto-fires a roughly 30-degree spread of 3-4 Poison Fangs that pierce multiple enemies and inflict the Poisoned debuff. It is dropped by Black Recluses, which are found in or around Spider Caves, with a 2.5*1/40 (2.5%) drop chance.
